food-details.name: Kathiyavadi Dish
food-details.desc: The vibrant and rich Gujarati cuisine in general consists of 4 regional cuisines- Kathiyawadi, Kutchi, Surti and Amdavadi. Each of these regions has a distinctive flavours associated with its local food that brings their own uniqueness to the Gujarati cuisine.  Each dish has a blend of flavours – sweet, sour, spicy. Despite having a coastline with abundance seafood availability, Gujarat is primarily a vegetarian state due to the high influence of Jain and Hindu traditions.
